job_details.job_description: We are seeking an experienced GCP Engineer to join our team. The candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining cloud-based solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). The role requires strong knowledge of cloud infrastructure, data services, and DevOps practices.  Key Responsibilities:  Design and deploy scalable and secure cloud architectures in GCP  Manage GCP services such as BigQuery, Dataflow, Cloud Storage, Pub/Sub, and Compute Engine  Implement CI/CD pipelines and automate infrastructure using Terraform/Deployment Manager  Monitor system performance, optimize costs, and ensure security compliance  Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Data Engineers, Developers, and DevOps) to deliver cloud solutions
job_details.required_skills: Strong hands-on experience with GCP services (BigQuery, Cloud Functions, Dataflow, Pub/Sub, etc.)  Proficiency in SQL, Python, or Java  Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab, or Cloud Build)  Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes (GKE)  Familiarity with cloud security best practices  Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
